Text.Page: You rescued the villagers kidnapped by the vampirs for the Banquet of Blood.

Apparently the vampirs do not give up so easily. They have abducted a number of villagers and are now attempting to complete their ritual with the blood of these innocents.

You must return to the Banquet of Blood and free the captured villagers!
Please help me! These vampirs mean to kill me! <NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"You're safe now, but you should go."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
I'm trying to be brave—but the vampirs killed everyone else, and they'll be coming for me next! <NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Go home quickly, now—your family is worried."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
You have done a noble service today, <PCNAME>. Balder smiles upon you!
